decks.notes: This UR Control deck focuses on countering and removing threats while drawing cards and controlling the tempo of the game. It utilizes Counterspell, Force of Negation, Lightning Bolt, and Galvanic Discharge to control the board, combined with cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Tune the Narrative for card advantage. The deck also includes versatile cards like Subtlety, Stern Scolding, and Dress Down to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The goal is to outvalue the opponent by efficiently controlling the game and winning through powerful threats like Snapcaster Mage.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. The key strategy revolves around using powerful control cards like Counterspell and Force of Negation to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while utilizing cards like The One Ring and Teferi, Time Raveler for card advantage and tempo plays. The goal is to maintain control of the battlefield and slow down the opponent's aggression until the player can establish their own win condition, such as Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury or Supreme Verdict.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, and Amped Raptor. Utilizing powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge, along with support from cards like Guide of Souls and Inti, Seneschal of the Sun, the deck aims to deal damage swiftly and efficiently. Key cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Flooded Strand provide additional support and versatility. The inclusion of Static Prison helps control the opponent's board, while Arena of Glory and Ocelot Pride boost the deck's aggression and power.

The main focus of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan while utilizing creature removal, discard spells, and graveyard recursion. Its win condition is through using cards like Necrodominance and Soul Spike to deal direct damage to the opponent. The deck also synergizes with sacrificing creatures for value with cards like Malakir Rebirth and Orcish Bowmasters. With a mix of disruption, removal, and recursive threats, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent in a longer game.

The main concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells in order to quickly deal damage and win the game. The deck utilizes cards like Chthonian Nightmare, Thoughtseize, and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also including creatures like Warren Soultrader and Gravecrawler to apply pressure on the opponent. Additionally, cards like Goblin Bombardment and Marionette Apprentice provide additional reach and potential for direct damage. Overall, the deck aims to be fast, disruptive, and lethal in a Modern 1 vs 1 environment.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble the three pieces of Urza's Tower, Urza's Power Plant, and Urza's Mine to generate a large amount of mana and cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes control elements like All Is Dust and Dismember to deal with opposing threats. Karn, the Great Creator can search for powerful artifacts like Expedition Map or Boseiju, Who Endures to further solidify the deck's control strategy. Ultimately, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with big threats and powerful control elements.

The deck focuses on using a toolbox of creatures to combo off and win the game. By tutoring for specific creatures with cards like Chord of Calling and Summoner's Pact, the deck can assemble powerful combinations such as Thassa's Oracle with Nadu, Winged Wisdom to win the game. The deck also includes protection cards like Lightning Greaves and Sylvan Safekeeper to protect its key creatures. With a mix of ramp, tutoring, and protection, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and secure a victory.

This Mono Black Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, while also utilizing powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Necrodominance. The deck aims to control the board by removing threats and generating card advantage through spells like Fell the Profane and Soul Spike. The inclusion of March of Wretched Sorrow and Malakir Rebirth provides additional value and utility. The deck also has a strong mana base with Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth and Phyrexian Tower to support its powerful spells and creatures.
